name: @supermarsx/patcherjs
description: Typescript binary patching utility for windows that works as a standalone application or a library

scripts.sea-copy: npm run sea-copy-config && npm run sea-copy-7z && npm run sea-copy-patch_files
scripts.sea-build-full: npm run ts-build-clean && npm run esbuild && npm run sea-build && npm run sea-pack && npm run sea-copy && npm run sea-predist && npm run sea-dist
scripts.sea-build-full-clean: npm run sea-cleanup-full && npm run sea-build-full
scripts.sea-cleanup-full: npm run ts-build-clean && npm run sea-cleanup

scriptsComments.esbuild: ESBuild the standalone executable into a JS file (executable.js) on the 'sea' folder
scriptsComments.sea-build: Executes the SEA (single executable application) building script (builder.js) according to nodes sea generation guidelines (needs ts-build to be ran first)
scriptsComments.sea-pack: Packs all files in 'patch_files_unpacked' and drops them into 'patch_files' to be used by the patcher
scriptsComments.sea-copy: Copies 'config.json', 'patch_files' folder contents and 7zip binaries from node_modules to 'predist' folder (needs npm install to be ran first)
scriptsComments.sea-predist: Compresses built SEA file and its additional files into a 7zip archive using predist script (predist.js) (needs ts-build to be ran first)
scriptsComments.sea-dist: Merges SFX 7zip module and 7zip archive into a single file (no prompts) (needs 'sea-build' to be ran first)
scriptsComments.sea-dist-prompt: Merges SFX 7zip module, SFX 7zip module script and 7zip archive into a single file (with prompt) [alternative to no prompt]
scriptsComments.sea-build-full: Run full SEA build process including SFX ready for distribution (runs 'ts-build-clean', 'esbuild', 'sea-build', 'sea-copy', 'sea-predist' and 'sea-dist')
scriptsComments.sea-build-full-clean: Same as 'sea-build-full' but executes 'sea-cleanup-full' first, serves as a full clean build
scriptsComments.sea-cleanup-full: Build Typescript files and fully clean up build space
scriptsComments.sea-copy-7z: Copies 7-zip binaries from 'node_modules' to 'predist folder' (needs npm install to be ran first)
scriptsComments.generate-docs: Generates documentation using typedoc to 'docs' folder
